column4: Hey mate! chatting with you now from Ubuntu! Man this rocks ;).. Hmm a question tho. Do you use msn? I downloaded Kopete. But sending a file is not working, and viewing ppls webcam is not working either
blame microsoft, they haven't developed the codec for 64 as I understand it
i was just about to try it :P
it will basically delete you entire computer while it's running
I had to change it to /dev/dsp1  iirc
how will i know where to change it too?
I can't remember why I changed it....
but dev/dsp didn't work for me
any idea how i can get it to work for me?
like u had? that folder did not exist
oddly enough, it doesn't seem to exist here either, :P  but it works
when i connected the speaker/headphones are automatically muted
